ModMetaData.name: DE Surgeries
ModMetaData.author: DarknessEyes
ModMetaData.description: New surgeries: * Repair ear damage. * Repair nose damage. * Repair finger and toes. * Remove gut worms and muscle parasite. * Use glitterworld medicine to cure chronic diseases. * Inject medicine to put patient into sleep and increase healing speed. /n/ Shamelessly updated to A14 without permission by KapTaiN_KaVerN * Added Pelvis reconstruction
